name: Zombie Shooting Apocalypse X 2
description:
Shoot and splat zombie blood everywhere as you blast them and save the world.

Help Me !!! Zombies are taking over… again, its an undead apocalypse. Zombie monsters from all walks of life are out to eat human brains, naturally, and its your job to shoot and re-kill these undead monsters back to hell. Use your shotgun to kill them infectors to bits and see their guts explode like a pizza, its judgment day baby!!
Jump n shoot your way through 30 levels of classic style platform action and reach the door at the end of each level. Collect coins as you travel to unlock new levels, these door’s need cash to unlock. But don’t worry there’s coin’s a plenty to collect as you bounce around. You got 3 health to survive, once their gone its good night.

FEATURES
- 3 0 levels of gory zombie shooting; blood splatting; jumping action.
- Super easy platform game controls. Just 2 shift buttons and 2 action buttons. Tap jump again to double jump.
- Sweet retro music, cool jungle plant style graphics, and cartoon art style characters.
- Ability to get 50 free coins by watching a quick video, no need to pay.
- No wi-fi network needed to play.

It’s time to experience the apocalypse, save the world, and get some addicting zombie shooting action. People who love retro style NES or Genesis platformers will love this too.
